text:
@realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Is there any time where you don't act like a petulant 12 year old?
Check out this write-up on UR pandemic response:
https://t.co/uK3pvnVi5R

Pretty much hits the mark. 

UR incompetence, corruption & failed leadership in a time of national crisis is overwhelming. 70 days nada.
